name: HACKED (itch) (RendangGameDev)
description:
"Less Health More Damage" Control
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Mouse cursor to aim
  • Left mouse for shoot
  • Scroll wheel to change weapon
Tools
  • Unity 2019.4
  • Inkscape
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • sfxr (https://sfxr.me/)
Another Info
  • This is my first game jam
  • I made this game in 5 days
